sentences.en: a cotton reel
sentences.cn: 棉线轴

sentences.en: A file that spans more than one magnetic tape reel.
sentences.cn: 一种存放在多盘磁带(卷)上的文件.

sentences.en: a fishing rod and reel
sentences.cn: 钓竿和钓线轴

sentences.en: A reel is in four-four time, and a jig is in six-eight time.
sentences.cn: 里尔舞曲是四四拍，吉格舞曲是六八拍。

sentences.en: a reel on a fishing rod
sentences.cn: 钓鱼竿上的绕线轮

sentences.en: And the orchestra crashed into that best of all reel tunes , " Dixie. "
sentences.cn: 于是乐队哗地一声奏起了最美妙的舞曲《迪克西 》.

sentences.en: Andy reeled away from the bar and knocked over his stool.
sentences.cn: 安迪踉跄着离开吧台，把凳子都撞倒了。

sentences.en: Baker's rod is splintered , and Mond's reel is out of fix.
sentences.cn: 贝德的钓竿已经裂了, 而蒙德的绕线已经损坏了.

sentences.en: He cast the line and then reel it back.
sentences.cn: 他把线抛出，然后把线绕回。

sentences.en: He could reel off the dates of the kings of England.
sentences.cn: 他能流畅地说出所有英国国王的生卒年份.

sentences.en: He could reel off the names of all the capitals of Europe.
sentences.cn: 他能一口气说出欧洲各国首都的名字.

sentences.en: He gave me the information I asked for straight off the reel.
sentences.cn: 他滔滔不绝地向我介绍我所询问的情况.

sentences.en: He won three games off the reel.
sentences.cn: 他一连胜了3场.

sentences.en: I shall not reveal the movie's final reel.
sentences.cn: 我不会透露该片的结局。

sentences.en: I slowly reeled the fish in.
sentences.cn: 我慢慢地收卷鱼线，将鱼拉过来。

sentences.en: reeled off a long list of names and dates.
sentences.cn: 一口气背出一长串名称和时间

sentences.en: she proceeded to reel off in rapid Italian the various dishes of the day.
sentences.cn: 他接着用意大利语快速报出这天的各种各样菜肴。

sentences.en: She took up some scissors and a reel of white string.
sentences.cn: 她拿起几把剪刀和一轴白线.

sentences.en: The child could reel off many poems of the Tang Dynasty at the age of five.
sentences.cn: 这孩子五岁时就能把许多唐诗倒背如流.

sentences.en: the final reel
sentences.cn: 影片结尾部分

sentences.en: The fishing line was hopelessly snarled on the reel.
sentences.cn: 钓丝缠到绕线轮上,乱得理不出来.

sentences.en: The rod bent double, the reel shrieked and ratcheted.
sentences.cn: 操作杆进一步弯曲，线轴发出刺耳的吱吱声。

phrases.tran_cn: 不停地，立即；滔滔不绝地
一口气说出；滔滔不绝背出

trans.tran_cn: 卷轴，卷盘，卷筒，绕在卷轴上的线（或金属丝、胶卷等）
trans.tran_en: a round object onto which film, wire, a special string for fishing etc can be wound
to wind sth on/off a reel

trans.tran_cn: 蹒跚，摇晃，来回旋转，眩晕
trans.tran_en: to walk in an unsteady way and almost fall over, as if you are drunk
to wind (cotton, thread, etc) onto a reel
